titleStmt.title: H. M. Prentice et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG11505

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: 45th, 47th, 48th, and 49th Regiments Kentucky Infantry Muster Rolls

body.p:
Head-Quarters Camp Nelson,
Jessamine Co. Ky. Oct 26th 1863
To his Excellency
Thos E Bramlette
Frankfort Ky

The Undersigned officers of the 49th Ky vol Respectfully request that you appoint Dr S B Swisher asst Surgeon of the 49 Ky vol
-- The Doctor has been acting as asst having been detailed by Genl Fry
-- He has done his duty faithfully and it is the wish of the Regiment that he remain with them -- He is a Graduate and well qualified

Philos Stratton
Major Comd.g Regt
J. J. Black 1st Lt, Co, H,
J. Mattingly 1st Co G
Stephen Golden Capt Co A
John M Cook Capt Comp D
B. F. Howard camd. Co. )E(
William T. Bryant. Capt. Camd.g. Co (C)
W. W. Woodward
Capt and Act I Genl

W. B. Swisher com Assistant Surgeon, 49' Infy Octr 26. 1863.
1. 2. 3. 4. 5

49 Infy
Asst Surg.
Swisher
Com issd & forwd
Novr 11. 1863
Issue -- and send to Camp Nelson -- Care of Gen Fry.

Med. Commission: Office
Louisville Nov. 10th 1863
To
John Boyle
Adj't Gen'l Ky. Vols.
Sir
The Medical Commission have examined Dr W. B. Swisher and recommend him as well qualified for a commission as Assistant Surgeon --

Respectfully &c
R. C. Hewitt
Mem. of Comm. & Recorder
